Sentencas: The demand for highly efficient power generation systems is ever escalating to reduce carbon dioxide emissions.
Titulo: A quadruple power generation system for very high efficiency and its performance optimization using an artificial intelligence method

Sentencas: This study proposes a novel quadruple power generation system, investigates its performance characteristics, and optimizes its efficiency using an artificial intelligence method based on the results of a thermodynamic simulation.
Titulo: A quadruple power generation system for very high efficiency and its performance optimization using an artificial intelligence method

Sentencas: The quadruple system integrates four power blocks consisting of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), a molten carbonate fuel cell (MCFC), a gas turbine, and an organic Rankine cycle to achieve high efficiency.
Titulo: A quadruple power generation system for very high efficiency and its performance optimization using an artificial intelligence method

Sentencas: A parametric analysis of the main design parameters was conducted.
Titulo: A quadruple power generation system for very high efficiency and its performance optimization using an artificial intelligence method

Sentencas: An artificial intelligence method combining an artificial neural network and a genetic algorithm was devised to avoid the slow speed of the calculation for the thermodynamically optimal solution and used to find the optimized design parameters that produce the maximum efficiency.
Titulo: A quadruple power generation system for very high efficiency and its performance optimization using an artificial intelligence method

Sentencas: The results of the thermodynamic parametric analysis were used to train the artificial neural network.
Titulo: A quadruple power generation system for very high efficiency and its performance optimization using an artificial intelligence method

Sentencas: The results of the optimization method were verified through comparison with the results of thermodynamic analysis.
Titulo: A quadruple power generation system for very high efficiency and its performance optimization using an artificial intelligence method

Sentencas: A very high maximum efficiency of 78.1% was predicted.
Titulo: A quadruple power generation system for very high efficiency and its performance optimization using an artificial intelligence method

Sentencas: The performance of the optimized quadruple system was examined by comparing it with that of other hybrid power systems.
Titulo: A quadruple power generation system for very high efficiency and its performance optimization using an artificial intelligence method
